title: Nonlinear Self-Defense Training: Situational Response Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental physical activity capabilities and daily life safety awareness
context.additional_context: Learners aim to acquire practical self-defense techniques applicable in real-life and risk situations. Includes training in situational analysis using mathematical thinking.

learning_goals: Learners can rapidly analyze risk situations with 80% accuracy and select appropriate response strategies.
Learners can demonstrate flexible physical manipulation skills by applying nonlinear learning principles in three consecutive assessments.
Learners can improve their personalized training plans by over 70% based on peer feedback and formative assessment data.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
